resource_notes: Requires deep knowledge of .NET security and Jint library internals to prevent sandbox escapes.
alternative_approach: Could be assigned to a mid-level developer but would require significant oversight from the lead, increasing review hours by 50%.
risk_factors: Potential for misconfiguration of the sandboxing options or an unknown vulnerability in the Jint library itself.
mitigation_strategy: Conduct a rigorous code review of the Jint Options configuration against library documentation and security best practices.

task_name: Integrate and Configure Monaco Editor Component
resource_notes: Requires expertise in integrating complex third-party React components and managing their lifecycle.
alternative_approach: Use a simpler editor like CodeMirror, but with reduced feature set (less intellisense, validation).
risk_factors: Monaco Editor integration complexity; potential for UI performance issues if not configured correctly (e.g., lazy loading).
mitigation_strategy: Allocate time for a 'deep dive' spike on Monaco to build expertise. Use lazy-loading for the Monaco component.

resource_notes: Requires deep understanding of both legacy and new data models. Must be idempotent.
alternative_approach: Manual migration by professional services, which would be slower and more error-prone.
risk_factors: Legacy data format is more complex than anticipated, delaying migration script development.
mitigation_strategy: Perform a data analysis spike on legacy data before starting the migration script task.
